nodes.text: This LEP servant droid was stationed on Coruscant in 21 BBY during the Clone Wars.

This droid worked for Senator Padmé Amidala when she held a party for Senator Aang and helped her set the main table. When C-3PO and R2-D2 came back to the party with jogan fruit, this droid set the garnish on the cake and handed it to the baker droid so that he could present it.
